title: Ticket #5216: Record problem schedds in negotiator ad
description:
CMS accidentally messed up schedd<->negotiator authorization on 10 out of 30 schedds.

We should record in the negotiator ad (and maybe the schedd ad?) whenever there's a permission denied (or other error) in negotiation.

Right now, we only record user names for negotiation failures -- and that's across all schedds.
creator: bbockelm
